meanings.sent1: She felt unwell after being reinfected with the flu.
meanings.sent2: He coughed loudly, showing he was reinfected with a cold.
meanings.sent3: The cat sneezed comically after being reinfected with a tiny bug.
meanings.sent4: The garden, once flourishing, now looked reinfected with weeds.
meanings.sent5: The room smelled musty, as if reinfected with old odors.

meanings.sent1: The patient quickly reinfected after leaving the hospital.
meanings.sent2: The virus spread easily, causing many to reinfected within days.
meanings.sent3: The cookie jar seemed to have reinfected itself magically overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was reinfected with memories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The computer system was reinfected by the same malware.
